title: the store won't show up since 4.20
body:
Ok so... Ever since 4.20 with the huge issue with the store, it's been nothing but a black screen for me. It was "Session expired" or jst plain lag in the early 4.20. As stated in the status back then. But ever since it was "fixed" all I could get was a black screen. I can't even go through my champion list to buy 'em. I can't see the price, I can't see "buy" buttons. And i don't understand why.
I waited for 4.21. repaired my client. reinstalled. resynchronized my computer clock. I even made IE my main browser AND updated it all the way. updated video drivers, downloaded a fresh copy of LoL and reinstalled...
None of the archive link works. Google doesn't help (nothing but 2012 posts) and everything store-related seems to have vanished from the website world. troubleshooting only talks about the patcher, and when it talks about the launcher, it's still about the patcher. I don,t have issue with patching the game...

I'm about to reformat my whole computer, even though I know it won't help me at this point. 

I've joined a screenshot of my issue. it's been like that for what seems like forever.

replies.body:
Hey Nach,

Since you've gone through the Wrenchmen's toolbox with no success, you should [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as it may be an issue on a deeper level since it's happening randomly!

Hello nachthemel, I see this issue you WERE having, and was hoping you have info on a fix.  I say WERE past tense since I see you have the golden spatula icon thus you must have had access to the store since.

My girlfriend is having this issue nonstop and cant seem to get store to load.
Still waiting on a fix for this........... i see PLENTY of other posts about it yet, no answer for the problem?

Mine hasn't worked ether. When i do get past the black screen It doesn't even let me try to buy a skin it has "unlock champ" even tho i own the champ.


-UPDATE!!!!
Tried to repair my client. then went to store still wasnt working. went to summoner profile then champions then click around on some skins then right when i was going to give up it started working and stopped saying "unlock Champion" so for NOW its working for me...

This is happening to me as well... its the entire store that is borked.

I have tried wrenchmans toolbox as well as the ie time synch thing, gifting center fix and none of it is working. I would really really love to purchase all the new skins but I simply cannot get on the store page.

Please get this resolved soon RIOT.

Another red post here would be wonderful to see just to give us an update on how its coming along.

I don't understand how the client works. Ealier i said it was working (for a very short time) then it went black again. but now it works as if nothing ever happened. I did nothing today to help fix the issue, it was all saturday and sunday (for the latest attempts, at least) and even then it didn't work. 
How come right now it has no more issues? This is the same thing with LoLMath... I'm completely lost as it makes no sense whatsoever.

Has restarting my PC 4 times since saturday helped? Is there a sequence to follow?

Edit, yep, broken again and all I did was click on the runes tab.
I'm having this same issue.  I can't get the store to load up and have done just about everything the wrench guide suggested.
I also have done the same thing and it appears to be doing the same thing. I would try going into your riot games folder then going to the lol.client then starting lol that way.
I would re-install my adobe programs air, shockwave etc...

Either it takes a whole week for the wrench guide to work... or this store is 3000% completely random..... or someone is pressing the "let's annoy them" button just for the kick of it.

Yeah, I decided to go and play some more. now the store just works for no reason.... and I did nothing today to resolve the issue except come on the board to cry a bit.


Edit: nevermind. broke again while I was typing this.
